text: Juan Carlos Velasco Pérez (born 3 August 1952) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. He served as Deputy of the LIII and LX Legislatures of the Mexican Congress representing Michoacán. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Michoacán Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Juan Carlos Velasco Pérez
